description: This file defines a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock used for unit testing, which implements multiple store-related interfaces (IStore, IStore2, IStoreCache, IStoreInspector, IStoreLimit). It declares mock methods corresponding to store operations such as SetValue, GetValue, DeleteKey, and others, utilizing Google Mock. The class is designed to facilitate testing components that depend on storage interfaces.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A Google Mock class implementing multiple storage-related interfaces for unit testing storage-dependent components.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration function for IStore or IStore2 notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration function for IStore or IStore2 notifications.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair in the store, either in default namespace or with specified scope.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value associated with a key in the store.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a specific key from the store.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting an entire namespace from the store.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a namespace or scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting the storage limit for a namespace.
